fulltext:
NGUYEN TUAN DUC (Mr.) 
IT BUSINESS ANALYST 
ABOUT ME 
Never hesitate to work hard to get more experiences and try my 
best to contribute to the company’s success. 
Approach and contribute knowledge with colleagues. 
Research and discover new related technologies. 
Operate and release new function with having good UX-UI and 
behavior user. 
Analyst, evaluate with stakeholders in order to consult to 
stakeholders by suitable solutions. 
My career path is to become a IT Business Analyst expert in field 
of software technology and relevant software’s solution 
Mail: 
duc.ntuan@gmail.com 
Phone:  
090 6859 322 
Add:  
District 7, HCMC 
SPECIAL KNOWLEDGE 
Object  Oriented 
Programming 
Algorithm  and  Data 
structure 
Analysis  and  Design 
Information System, UML. 
SQL  Database  Server 
Management 
Power Design Tool, Axure, 
Visual 
Studio, 
Visio, 
Mockup Balamiq. 
WORKING EXPERIENCE 
October, 2018 until now: Easy Credit VN 
Position: IT Business Analyst 
Key task: 
✓ Receive, collect, requirement, relevant document. 
✓ Provide neccessary information to departments, staff which 
related to individual task. 
✓ Synchronize and standardize document system. 
✓ Analyst, evaluate, clarify, summarize requirement to consult 
suitable solution to stakeholder when combinating between 
business language and technical language. 
✓ Connect and integrate API between company system and 3rd 
parties system. 
✓ Operate Kanban and Scrum methodologies into team-work 
✓ Follow and update working process, project progress to PM, 
Stakeholder. 
✓ Organize demo for every big module/function in while project 
progress. 
✓ Join verification output/result testing before releasing to  
stakeholder/user/etc/ 
✓ Finished 
projects: 
Document 
Management 
System, 
Reconciliation Management Portal, Dev Portal, Call Center 
Management, Credit Expert System. 
March, 2017 to May, 2018: Sendo Technology JSC 
Position: Business Analyst and Product Owner. 
Key task: 
✓ Receive, collect and handle requirement document. 
✓ Synchronize and standardize document system. 
✓ Find out solution and consultant to customer, stakeholder. 
✓ Analyst, modeling, consultant business solution, back-end 
data function by oriented CRM 
✓ Build and develop tools applied Odoo: product 
management, config data tools. 
✓ Research new technology: Progressive Web Apps. 
✓ Operate simple Kanban, Scrum. 
✓ Use Atlassian JIRA, Atlassian Confluence, Trello 
management. 
✓ Finished projects: Digital marketing tool, CRM system, 
Product management. 
January, 2016 to February, 2017: Mat Bao Corp. 
Position: Business Analyst 
Key task: 
✓ Analyst system document and analyst specific document. 
✓ Researching about O-doo, WHMCS. 
✓ Build document system. 
✓ Analyst, modeling, clerify requirement. 
✓ Receive requirement from stakeholder. 
✓ Finished projects: Enterprise resource management (ERM), 
CRM for Human Resource, Tele-sale management. 
April, 2015 to December, 2015: TAA Corp. 
Position: Developer, Business Analyst 
Key task:

in

2013:

Specialist prize 
✓ Joined all project which specialized in coding, deploying 
product of ERP solution 
✓ Management Software Pharmacy Company: Accounting and 
Finance, Sale, Inventory stock. 
✓ Management Software Dong Nai Pharmacy Company, 
modules include: Accounting and Finance, Sale and 
Purchase, Inventory stock. 
✓ Using data queries. 
✓ Build document system. 
THANK YOU FOR YOUR ATTENTION! 
THE END
